title: Through my eyes: Kilkenny Primary School, South Australia
creator_credit: Film Australia, Timothy Read and Donald Crombie
brief_description: Kilkenny Primary School is an open-plan school in Adelaide. A bright decor with red carpets, a straw covered ceiling, and splashes of bright colors provides the setting for the activities of senior primary pupils and their teachers. The implementation of a team teaching approach, individual and group work, and the integration of activities and ideas are illustrated in the film. (Teacher education)
